title: Australia
description: While readers may know something about Australia's boomerangs or its kangaroos, they may not know about the other interesting animals, such as koalas and platypuses, or the diverse groups of people, including the Aborigines, that live there. This informative book also provides an overview of the geography and history of this fascinating country.
highFrequencyWords: bauxite, colony, continent, convict, depression, hemisphere, immigration, mammal, marsupial, nomads, primate, reef, threatened
reviewWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
awareness: Contractions                : Distinguish and use appropriate possessive pronouns/contractions
phonics:
Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
